name: fav_soccer_team_matches
description: Bitbar plugin for viewing your favorite soccer team's upcoming matches and recent scores.

scripts.build: parcel build index.js --no-minify --no-source-maps --out-dir ../ --out-file fav_soccer_team_matches.10m.js && echo "#!/usr/bin/env /usr/local/bin/node"|cat - ../fav_soccer_team_matches.10m.js > /tmp/out && mv /tmp/out ../fav_soccer_team_matches.10m.js && chmod +x ../fav_soccer_team_matches.10m.js

author: Taylor Sturtz
